name: StrokeLocation
shortdesc: The placement of path or selection boundary strokes.

property.name: INSIDE
property.shortdesc: The border is placed inside the selection or layer boundaries.

property.name: CENTER
property.shortdesc: The border is placed in the center of the the selection or layer boundaries.

property.name: OUTSIDE
property.shortdesc: The border is placed outside the selection or layer boundaries.
